title: Red square, Part Two | WAR DRAMA

sources.title: Red square, Part Two | WAR DRAMA
sources.description:
Part One: https://youtu.be/O-obG4tOonc

A historical-revolutionary drama about the birth of the Red Army, front-line friendship, love, about heroic and difficult youth of a new country.

IMDb rating: 7.0

Year of production: 1970

Director: Ordynsky Vasily
Writers: Dunsky Yuliy, Frid Valery
Composer: Basner Veniamin
Operator: Zheleznyakov Valentin
Production designer: Leonid Platov

Cast: Shulgin Victor, Yakovlev Sergey, Nikonenko Sergey, Kormunin Pavel, Lyubshin Stanislav, Karachentsov Nikolay, Kutepov Alexander, Malyavina Valentina, Shalevich Vyacheslav, Kaidanovsky Alexander, Lakirev Victor, Masanov Dmitry, Parfenov Nikolay, Poloskov German, Smirnov Alexey, Surovtsev Igor , Trifonov Petr, Uno Loit, Khomyatov Roman
